snippet: Jennifer Beck did not know the man she would eventually fall for, but she knew precisely what sort of engagement ring she wanted, and no other ring would do.
abstract: Vows column on wedding of Jennifer Beck and Brian Goldblatt.
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Beck did not know the man she would eventually fall for, but she knew precisely what sort of engagement ring she wanted, and no other ring would do.

headline.print_headline: He Can Stand the Heat in the Kitchen
headline.main: Jennifer Beck and Brian Goldblatt: He Can Stand the Heat in the Kitchen
